Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning of Miyazawa’s life at the beginning of the century (part I) and his tragic death from tuberculosis in 1933 (part II). Writer-director Miike Mikako takes on the challenge of uniting these two diverse stories under a unified theme.<|end_of_text|>
